About Nat

Welcome to my personal website for creative computer science projects.

I hold a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Visual Arts from the University of Victoria (Spring 2024).

My interests span discrete mathematics, computer graphics, natural languages, and visual arts. Recently, I've been exploring soldering and electronics as well.

I love building things and solving problems — especially when solutions are elegant, whether visual, logical, or hands-on.

This site is a home for my technical and artistic experiments.

Visual Arts

What I love about visual arts — like mathematics — is the abstraction. It's a way to connect ideas and shift perspectives.

I've held independent exhibits, been featured in Calgary news, and now focus on creating more intentional work.

See more at natalieslaba.com.

Outdoors

I'm passionate about being in nature. Climbing challenges and humbles me — there’s always more to learn. I also enjoy backcountry skiing and exploring the mountains.
